name: No escape (itch) (SimTech)
description:
(This was a submission made in 1 week, to Matt Asplands game show off, which had a deadline until sunday 21.11.2021)

A third person shooter, where youre sendt in a facility as a SWAT force to eliminate a group of soldiers thats been  transformed into zombies after something went wrong with a experiment. You cant exit the facility before you have eliminated all the zombies.  Good luck!

Controls:

Right mouse button: Aim

Left mouse button: Shoot

R: Reload

Left CTRL: Crouch 

Left shift: Sprint

F: Turn on flashlight

X: Switch shooting modes (buggy, thanks to UE 4.26)

Known bugs

Music sometimes restarts if the shooting sounds clip

You have to press R two times if you must reload

Credits:

Developer: Åsmund Schei

Music:  Miguel Johnson - A good day to die
